values:
i met a girl named kirsten the other day...

She was wearing a shirt with the words across the chest that read "Hidden Talents"...

Usually i would've thought...OMG how Crazy Sexy is that...

But for some Reason...i thought WHORE instead o.O 

And she's Gorgeous...how wierd...

Watch Jannale Grill me for this... >.<


On a 2nd note why do so many things gotta be so superficial? 

haha...months of almost 0 output from this damn journal...and this is all i gotta say...

time to slip back into a Recession...

Man i hope Jon Kerry wins...Bush is an idiot...means well...but is an idiot...

ok...

his name is Tony Francisco...he's a distant cousin tho...like 3rd maybe...his whole family is talented...as far as his 2 sisters go...you can find one of em on Friendster...her nickname is Baby Joi...

The next time you're having a BAD DAY...imagine this...

-You're a Siamese Twin...

-Your brother attached at your shoulder is Gay...

-You're not...

-He has a date coming over tonight...

-You only have One Ass... \(^-*)? ...aRgh m8ti3!!

Ok so school's really been killing me lately...days are just way too long...i'm like a zombie monday thru thursday...and on Friday when i'm off...i'm actually SOOO drained...i can't even enjoy it...then there's mah baby Jannale...it's tough to have the strength to show her that i'm still as much in love with her as the first day...when i have almost 0 energy left...and i drown myself in a computer game because i have to exert the least amount of energy and thought into it...BUT...whatever...i'm done yacking bout that...

So anyways i've been loving the last few episodes of SmaLLviLLe...it's really been getting a lot better...with the exception of the annoying storyline they've got going between Lana and Clark...JEEZ...is it just me or have they been making Lana such a bitch...towards Clark at least...i'm so annoyed i'd actually not mind Chloe and Clark hooking up...but knowing me...once they do..i'd want it to end HAHA...or would i? heh...now onto THE MORE INTERESTING STUFF...soo...who exactly is this Adam Knight??? well...i'm guessing it's a young Bruce Wayne...aka...BATMAN!!!!  HELL YEAH!!! now you say what do i have to back up this theory??? how bout this...

Ok. This guy is not just your average joe. Alot of people have been speculating that Adam Knight is really Bruce Wayne a.k.a Batman. 

The clues I've seen that this could be true from tonight's Smallville episode(02-11-04) and past episodes 

1.)He has the right look, physically. 

2.)He knows martial arts. 

3.)He has impressive computer skills. 

4.)He has shown intelligence and seems very well read. 

5.)His personality seems dead on. His interaction with Lana Lang on tonight's episode seemed very much how a young Bruce Wayne might act. 

6.)He always wears Black and Grey...Batman Colors...just like Clark wears the obvious Superman Colors...

7.)"Adam" West/Dark "Knight"

    Whatever the case there is much more to Adam Knight than meets the eye. If he isn't Bruce Wayne then who is he? 

Well...if he isn't Bruce wayne my second theory is that he's Lionel Luther/Clark Kent clone...ewwww....that would be nutz...but not as insane as him being BATMAN OMG that would be sooo tite! It'll be true to the comics the first Batman/ Superman team up on smallville...WEEE...so awesome...hrrmm....what if we find out for sure maybe during the Finale or something...PICTURE THIS...on the Seaon Finale ending...

Adam is on the sidewalk saying his goodbyes to everyone in Smallville. A black sedan pulls up to the curb. A thin,balding Englishman with a pencil thin mustach gets out and opens the back door and says," Your going to be late for your flight,Master Bruce.".  hrmm...SWEETNESS!!!


OK...and once again i'll slip back into the shadow lands of the Live Journal Universe from whence i came...i mean...who likes to read my jibberish to begin with...

Ok...so it's been awhile since i've jotted down a few notes in this journal of mine...i don't know why...for sure...but hey...at least i'm not dead...contrary to popular belief...haha...anyhoo...hope each and everyone of my LJ homies had great X-mas and Happy New Year...as for me...took a trip down to Florida with the fams...we hit up Cocoa Beach...home of Pro Surfer Kelly Slater...got me some Island Gear at Ron Jon's Surf Shop...HELL YEAH...ISLAND STYLE BABEH!!! Then we headed on down to Miami...stayed with some Relatives...hit up South Beach...MY GOD...everyone down there as far as the women go...SHWING!! haha Must all be on that South Beach diet or something...and i also took a picture in front of the the Versace residence...yep...the one he was Murdered at...unfortunately the site is an even LARGER tourist spot...aside from Star Island...where you get to take a tour around and get pissed off site seeing Celebrity houses which you don't have and probably never will...except you Sean...if you get one of those houses...with a Yacht...you bastard i'm visiting you every fucken winter LOL...or at least let me stay there for the winter...cause i can do without snow for the rest of my life...iunno...i guess i was loving Florda sooo damn much...i wanted to move there lol...take J with me...but J loves da island...i mean who doesn't...then after that we hit up Universal Studios in Orlando...which wasn't too bad...i actually had fun...weather was BEAUTIFUL the whole time i was there too...even at the beach...but the water was still bout 65 degrees on an 80 degree day...ewww! All i know is next time i hit up South Beach i'm definitely going into MANGOS!!! OH HELL YEAH!!! Well Orlando was tite...i also got to hit up this big ass mall i think it's called the International Mall of Florida or something...but it was huge...and defintely for the upscale price shopper...MAN...i walked into Tommy Bahama and OMG...SOOO Expensive...but damn do they make Tropical Wear look hella sophisticated...like i'd be James Bond at the beach...there was also some store there that sold Cultural stuff...even Guam stuff...OWNAGE! But yeah...good times in Orlando...then from there it was off to Tampa for New Years...rang it in with Cousins and more Relatives...ones i hadn't seen in forever...years actually...damn ppl grow soooo fast...met my lil cousin Briana for the first time...the MOST ADORABLE 2 year old ever...reminds of her older sister Leilani when she was that age...it turns out Briana had the same bond with me as Leilani did...aww...i'm almost blushing thinking bout it...i miss that lil girl...as far as New Year's...well i rang it in with a bottle of Champaigne and a cooler full of Yiengling and Heineken...^^...i love that beer...and i LOVE YOU JANNALE!!! Damn even on the road...i didn't miss too many days of speaking to her...after...Florida...stopped in Virginia for a day...kicked it with my Cousin Larry...aka Poni haha don't ask...but shiet was fun kickin it with him again...stayed up all night downing Hieneken til it ran out..then downed just bout a whole 24 pack of Bud to ourselves haha...i mean damn i could tank some Heineken..but when it comes to Bud...it's OVER! We were playing Socom Navy Seals II and omg i was firing at shit and completing missions not even in the game HAHA...but all was good in da hood...good thing they had bananas there...i needed them the next day...and then...back to home it was...that was on the 2nd of January...and what have i been doing since then? Who cares??!! All i know is i'm addicted to a game...FFXI get your adventure on..meet a few Japs and learn how it's done...and on a GREATER NOTE...I LOVE MY GIRLFRIEND...baby you KNOW how much...also been gettin my Jack Johnson On...kickin it to the Rodeo Clowns...YEH YEH...and damn i love Island Music...i forgot just how much i love my island jamz...wish i could be a SIX STRING CONDUCTOR once again...what can i say i love music...whatever it is...like my homie Jay so put it...the essentials...Roots, Rock, Reggae and HipHop. anything hot... 50, the Roots, Gangstarr, H.O.V.A, Eminem etc. Dave is a must, Metallica,Led Zep, and the Wailers for sure, along w/ Jazz and the Island Stylee... Tupac is still alive, B.I.G. Forever, and Bob Marley will NEVER die. HAHA yeh by now i'm just ranting...well i'm back in school i don't have class til 12:45...what the hell do you want me to do?? I haven't wrote in ages...so now i'm letting it all hang out...and still i won't speak all there is to speak...OH...Sean and Amy...you guys are hella cool together...keep that love strong...and Decastro...hmm...looks like mah homie is gonna be what? 21??? OHHH SHOOOT!!! haha if you turn 21 this year...and i come out there soon...i'm making you HIT THE BOTTLE...Ya HEARD!!  I'ma introduce you to all mah favorite Homies...Jack, Jose, Johnny, Pepe, Captain Morgan, and Mr. Bacardi...and at the end of it all ima Crown ya Royale! REDRUM...REDRUM...^^ oHHH did i mention i got some Puerto Rican Rum too hah... at least Be an Alki with me for one day Decastro...haha Sean will join in too...and keep the bottles rollin...OH will you look at that...it's class time...and i ain't even excite...my my...i'm already tired of school...and i just got back...hahha...the life a strugglin Dopa...

P.S. (The following message is intended for a Mature Audience)
      Hey Amy...those undies were cute! LOL...
      And damn Chris if you get anymore buff i'm gonna have 
      to start working out FOR REALS too...

Okay so this morning in the cafeteria my friend Mike was just being a dork...and i was playing with my mini Panasonic Multimedia machine...well Mike just happened to let out this HORRENDOUSLY LOUD and HEINOUS FART! HAHAHA...and i had at that VERY MOMENT PRESSED RECORD ON AUDIO...and OMG i got the WHOLE FART ON AUDIO...LMAO...and sooo this big and BRIGHT IDEA CAME TO ME...well...in Economics we've been watching a lot of Powerpoints lately and the lights are turned off...and this ONE dude...he's like a major friggin Pothead always comes in and Falls Asleep in front of me...and this dude has like MAJOR B.O. i'm talking STRONG...well soon as he fell assleep i dropped my recorder while it was playin in his jacket pocket hanging behind him on his chair...and 5 seconds later FFFFFFFAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!! in an already SOUNDLESS CLASS...HAHHAAHAHA and the fart sound actually played soooo loud it scared the dude AWAKE and the whole class friggin cracked up and started clapping...i mean even the professor did a sort of SPIT LAUGH hahaha.....good thing i mananged to get back my player right before he got up and BOUNCED on outta there...hahah...

and in other news...i get my Wisdom teeth removed today...2:30 pm this afternoon...i'm goin under the knife...and i fear i'll be coming out of it LAUGHING GASSED UP...NUMB AS FUCK..and WITH A MOUTH FULL OF BLOOD =(

Been lazy bout updating lately...hmm...i just got out Economics class...we took a test today that i TOTALLY did not study for...it didn't seem as bad as i thought it would...i guessed on ONLY 2 questions...but i'm not so sure...UH OH...i just hope i get at least a B...if so...then i won't have to take the final...can't believe how fast the Semester is coming to a close...YAY...Dec 19 i'm DONE...and i don't have to go back til like JANUARY 20...W00T! Also...i've been spending so much time playing this game FFXI (Final Fantasy 11) shiet IS OFF THE MEAT RACK FOR REALS...it's HELLA FUN...i've now got a LEVEL 9 ELVAAN WARRIOR whom i'm going to transform into a DRAGOON and DARK KNIGHT...MUAHAHA...only thing is the damn game is soo fucken addicting...I JUST KNEW I WOULD GET ADDICTED TO IT TOO...lol...friggin Ken...he came and scooped me up on Friday and we went to Bestbuy to scoop it up...then i hung out at his house for couple hours learing all the basics...and just basically chillin...meanwhile gettin dissed by his lil sister...
    And funny thing...yesterday i was chillin in the library for some quiet time helping mah friend J-Poppa do his chemistry homework...and i've never ever takien chem in college...anyways...i solved his take home quiz for him!!! WEE! and then he had to jet for class...and shortly thereafter this girl comes down the stairs and i'm sitting on the couch and she sort of just outright stares at me with a sort of sly smile...then walks out...and a few minutes later she's FORGOTTEN...then like a minute later she strides on back in and sits on the couch beside mine...and i don't realize it's her...and then she goes..."Can you watch my bag" and she goes to bathroom...and comes out and eventually we start talking...she's a cool GAL...lol...Her name is Karyn...Her father is Italian and her mom's from EL Salvador...So we just kicked it and she told me bout shcool and how she's studying to become an Elementary teacher...and the funniest thing...she asked me if i had a girlfriend...and i was like YES I DO!!! WEE! and i proceeded to run her ear off bout J...lol...but she just smiled...LOL...but wOw...Chris...i thnk you'd like her...she has these natural wavy curls...a butt like BLAOW!!! Definitely LATINO...she looks so innocent tho...but like a lot of fun...hehe...it's always nice meeting new homies...oh...and she drives a 99' Escalade...LIKE WHOA! And today i was in my Eco class and she happened to pass by...and she waved...and silly me i almost didn't recognize her...but i did in time and waved back...ROFL...anyhoo...sorry...this post was just a bunch of POO! bah..lol....

OKAY...COMMON PEOPLE...HOOK ME UP WITH WHAT YOU THINK YOUR MASK IS AND WHY!!!! STOP SLACKIN...LIKE ICE CUBE SAID...YOU CAN DO IT PUT YOUR ASS INTO IT!!! SO HOOK A STRUGGLIN COLLEGE STUDENT UP and pull a CRAIG DAVID...FILL ME IN...LOL...okay that just didn't sound right...hmm...PLUS this is your chance to be immortalized in MY WORDS...you're all gonna be like references to me...

Ok guys...well i'm doing a research paper on Social Masks ppl use in society...or like life in general to either hide from something or feel like another person or whatnot...anyways...what i want is for you guys to think about what your social mask is...and why is it you think that is your mask...an example would be my all black contacts...they are my social mask...or so i think so...when i wear them...i feel like a different person...not so confined by what my general life is...it sorta makes me feel a bit more free to be that much more daring or open...well...now keep in mind that your mask DOES NOT HAVE to be an object(s) but could also be a HABIT, an EMOTION or EMOTIONAL RESPONSE or FEELING, etc etc...you get the point right? WELL...what's your social mask? and WHY?

THX EVERYONE...i appreciate it...i NOW LEAVE THE FLOODGATES OPEN...THE MORE IDEAS THE BETTER!!! THX AGAIN ALL!

THAT'S RIGHT....HDTV IS EVEN BETTER THAN DVD QUALITY!!!! WEEEE!!!! 56 inches of LANA LANG!!! LOL....OH BABY!!!!  and next episode looks to be a rather interesting one...and SHEIST on Angel...Spike is going thru some wierd ass shiet...like he's being pulled between teh real world and some other dimension...WHOA...and next week's episode of Angel is GONNA OWN...i think SPIKE FACES HELL!!!!
Also...i was in the library with my English Class learning how to PROPERLY use the internet and Library Databases to their ABSOLUTE fullest extent when one of our searches led us to A MOST DISTURBING DISTURBING website....OMG...HELL NAW!!! It actually looks pretty damn cool...i would definitely want to go see it...it's weird i grew up listening to a lot of Tupac...and i've always liked his music...his dramatized life...even his movies...it'd be cool to see more of his legacy brought back to life...IF YOU BELIEVE THEN YOU CAN ACHIEVE...JUST LOOK AT ME!  SUCCESSFUL EVEN IN DEATH...weird...

Do you ever just get that feeling where you don't want to talk to anybody? you dont want to smile, and you don't want to fake being happy. but at the same time, you don't know exactly what is wrong either. there isn't a way to explain it to someone who doesn't already understand. if you could want anything in the world it would be to be alone. people have stopped being comforting.. and being alone never was. at least when you're alone no one constantly asks you what is wrong and you dont know the answer. you feel the way you do just BECAUSE. you hope the feeling will pass soon and that you will be able to be yourself again, but until then all you can do is wait ...


P.S.      "The significant problems we face cannot be solved at the same level of thinking we were at when we created them." -Albert Einstein

Hmm...i feel down today...just some drama i'd rather not get into...i've had enough sad entries in my LJ since i've started it...

well...i had this mAjOr ARSE migraine the other day...and i took one GELCAP ADVIL...just swallowed it...NO WATER OR NOTHING...HARDCORE BABEH!!!  And it worked...in like 10 minutes or less HOLY SHIT... 8 hours of pain relief...but then it came back...POO...so i just went to bed at like 9:00 or 10:00...woke up and LO AND BEHOLD...it was 6:30 A.M. already...SIGH*...Jannale has her interview in front of the college of education panel today...GL J...i know you'll do just fine...you always do...

okay...well i just got done with my English Composition class and it's only 9:45 in the A.M....but my next class isn't until 2:30...LIKE WHOA!!! so what is a guy to do when he's stuck at school...hmm...study...chat with friends...stroll around school with friends...get my EAT on...oh and DRINK on...CHAT SOME MORE...OR...go to the library for a few minutes and UPDATE HIS LJ...rofl...it's crazy...i haven't been this into LJ in forever...but now it's been lots O fun...and you know something...i'd have to give up some props...EVENLY distributed to some of my LJ buddies...and they will have to be...Chris Sean and AimLeSS...yep...i think we've started a sort of LJ and the 4 AMIGOS...it just sucks MOOSE ASS that i can't be in Washington right now to kick it or what not...you guys are awesome...spurred the interest back into me...it's like reading a phrase "WORD...LIFE...ONE UP...SHAKAH, YA HEARD!!!"
sO..just want to say THX GUYS FOR BEING TOO COOL!!! I MEAN WHAT'S LJ WITHOUT YOUR FRIENDS RIGHT???

NOW GO AWAY...ya'll know how disfunctional i am...and if you don't...PLS REFER TO MY PERSONALITY DISORDER TEST...ok..i'm still as stumped as you are on that..ROFL...do i sound like i have issues??? lol...RHETORICAL QUESTION PEOPLE..RHETORICAL!!!! lol...

P.S. NOTE: FRIEND I MISS HEARING FROM THE MOST...
           Well SARA...i miss hearing from yOu the most...
           your comments are always short...but very sweet and 
           always appreciated...DOPA MISSES THEM...

P.S.S.  I LOVE YOU J...THANK YOU FOR...WELL...YOU...

Ok...so this morning....got up extra early and went with the family to church...i heard part of the Homily the priest gave...i was spaced out a lot of the time...however...the priest was talking bout Adam and Eve and how it's not right for Man to be alone cause God did not want it that way...that's why he created Woman...and that's why a man leaves home and a woman to be with another...now in the  world...man could go find another man...and woman another woman...or traditionally keep it HETERO...whichever they decide to swing...but then i blanked...and came to again when he was talking bout how only if you accept heaven as a child...like thought wise...will you get in...or what not...but i ramble once again...WELL...he told  a story bout how this lady who walked into this room with a Long table in the center...and on the table were two dishes...the first was a bowl of apples...and next to it was a note written in the normal writing of an adult  that said...TAKE ONE AND ONLY ONE APPLE...GOD IS WATCHING...so she took one...then she came to the second dish..which was a plate of Cookies...and next to the plate was a note written in the scribble of a child...that said...TAKE AS MANY COOKIES AS YOU WANT...GOD IS WATCHING THE APPLES!!! LOL...okay...now i don't know...i jus found that Amusingly Cute...it actually woke me up and i stayed awake the rest of the mass....

         Well after coming home...my parents left to B.J.'s which is like Costco...or Winco...and i stayed home cause i wanted to make breakfast...meanwhile...i was talking to Sean bout his new icon...and how it reminded us of CABLE...from the comics...i think we mustve sent at least 13 messages back and forth thru LJ...rofl...afterwards...i decided to make me an omelette for breakfast...mmmMMMMmmm....and AFTER THAT!!!

THEN...I HAD THE CRAZIEST IDEA...
                 Well my dog Romeo...he's a Toy Poodle...(NO..HE'S NOT A STUFFED ANIMAL...HE'S A REAL DOG...MINIATURE) but anyways...he was growling at me to take him outside to do HIS BUSINESS...so i took him out back to the back yard and i was watching him from the deck...and he frantically marked which must've been at least 12 different spots...and i realized...DAMN...I NEED TO take a MAJOR leak too...so i let him back in the house...and so then  i went to every single spot he marked...and remarked it!!!!! LOL...and HOLY SHIT...my dog was watching from the sliding door and he was GOING NUTZ....so i let him out...and what does the CRAZY DOG DO...he goes barking and growling to EVERY SINGLE SPOT I JUST REMARKED...and REMARKED IT ALL OVER AGAIN....ROFL...LMAO...then like an HOUR LATER...i went back out there and REMARKED IT AGAIN...LOL...and my dog went friggin crazy again...scratchin at the sliding door...OMG...LMAO...so i let him out and he goes and MARKS IT ALL OVER AGAIN...LOL...but this time i drove him crazy because i must've marked like 18 spots this time....LOL...ROFL...LMAO...OMG...SADLY...and WEIRDLY...IT WAS NOT ONLY FUN...IT WAS FRIGGIN HILARIOUS!!!  ANIMALS...SHEESH...ME...SIGH*

Well that was my Sunday...so far...now it's back to reading and studying...shcool beckons as a new weeks begins...plus J...is probably gonna be like..what the heck is this guy doing...OMG...LOL...i guess i've had enough free time on my hands...

If you could rid the world of one emotion, what would it be? Personally I'd say jealousy 9 out of 10 times. That 1 vote would most likely be regret. However, regret and jealousy seem to be ugly sisters in the way they are comprehended. In a sense, jealousy is the act of regretting not being or having something other than what you are. Regret in the modern sense though, is getting drunk and consequently horny, and then the only thing you feel the next morning besides a hang over, is regret... well usually thats the case for at least one of the parties who slept together. Regret also takes the form of a lost oppurtunity, a chance you had to do something great, or maybe just do something at all, and you failed or wussed out. So now we have the Regret of not having done something, the Regret of having done something you wish you hadn't, and the regret that is so closely related to jealousy. Regret and jealousy plague my life, of this I am sure, sometimes i feel like i'm not even living because i'm spending all my time whining about the past and worrying about the future, I never stop and look around, the most widely known quote from Ferris Bueller is so god awfully true, Life moves fast, if you don't stop to look around once in a while, you could miss it... This is harder than it sounds. To look around at the present you have to let go of the past for a minute and not care what misfortunes the future has in store, you have to smile and relax, you have to like what you're doing and who you are, and in my case, you have to be extremely intoxicated via some illegal narcotic to attain this sublime state. I'm aspiring to learn the entire "To be or not to be" Hamlet speech, a lot of people disregard Shakespeare or asociate him with english assignments and therefore consider him a pest, but William Shaky is probably the greatest writer ever. I feel that his work is greatly un-apreciated but i'm gonna stop here and go do something happy...rofl....i guess i'm having one of those thought FUL days... However, I leave you with this, it may be generic but it can also be thought provoking.... If somebody wrote a book about your life, would anyone want to read it?? 

P.S - You think i'm nothing more than what you think I am.

Okay...sOoOoOo...i was reading my Literature book...FOR FUN...OMG...and i decided to read ahead on my assigned readings...and i started analyzing the stories and just looking for the TRUE meaning...because they ARE short stories...not the mass produced novel that usually is just written to entertain us...anyhoo...one of the stories involves a teen who hungers for love and a girlfriend but can't seem to get one because he's ugly...CLASSIC..person's UGLY...so person gets no time of day...anyhoo...this is what i thought...

         Everything is about appearance, physical form... what a bother.... Tons of people hate bugs, they think spiders are icky and misquitoes are the most annoying things ever, yet they will play joyfully with a lady bug or a fire-fly, when the truth is that these "pretty" bugs contain the same appendixes as the other ones you hate, they have the wings, and the serrated teeth and the clutchy tiny leg thingies.... Ok but my point is if your ugly, or nasty, or annoying, people won't give you the time of day, and if they do it's because they want you to go away. Being beautiful can make life just that much better. Then comes that saying, or that cliche, "accept who you are" or perhaps the one that says something along the lines of "Love yourself"...HUGS ALL AROUND because we all are loving creatures who are uncappable of envy and who are void of spite, un-aware of such things as malice and avarice, enlightened only in the arts of love and kindness, and in our land where the fairies spread aphrodisiacs amongst our flower gardens and .... o wait, thats that other world i used to live in, what was it called.... o ya they call it childhood, i live in a new world now, everything is as beautiful or as ugly as you think it is, except for man kind. Sure you can cherish the gifts we have given each other in this world but all i'm saying is that the rivers of filth that course through everyone's veins eventually overflow and cause disgusting words to babble out of our mouths or our bodies to perform atrocities. Life is ugly, and if this wretchedness cannot be seen on the surface of things than its just that more ugly. Humanity is ill natured and self-serviant, it's impossible to be human and not be terrible in some region of importance. I know I make things sound worse than they are, but it's fun, and my argument does hold some truth. I bet that you can't name one person that you can say you've known for a little while who is a truly good person, who doesn't have some area of mentality where they are just psycho or at least troubled. Every human you walk past on the sidewalk and in the cafeteria, every person that drinks from the water fountain in front of you or the previous person who checked out the same book as you..... all these people are FUCKED UP. They all have stories, they all have their most embarrassing moments, they all have secrets, evil secrets, they all have odd desires and habits, people will never cease to make the headlines of newspapers interesting. Whether you have the urge to be a child molestor or be put into bondage, or maybe you like being the center of attention or you only shop at abercrombie because of the logo.... whether sexual or social, physical or mental, everyone is fucked up. O ya and some people are suprising, hilarious, amazing, incredibly talented, breathtakingly beautiful, some are altruistic, sometimes all you really need is another person. k i'm done slandering humanity, bye.

Plus they gave us fresh baked loaf of their sourdough bread which was VERY VERY good...i have to admit...i've tried quite a few sourdoughs...but this one was awesome....crisp yet tender crust...and very very soft inside...i've never enjoyed soup and sandwich as much as i did then!
